body.p: A lot of interesting literature contains this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter.. Beside some information about the Developer Conference in San Francisco, we will provide you two featured stories: A success story about the Bugday and an interview with George K. Thiruvathukal, professor of computer science at Loyola University Chicago. And as usual a summary about the gentoo-dev-mailinglist, local meeting announcements, the press-coverage, security information and bugzilla-stats.
